articles.content: UNITED STATES: The distance between our solar system and the next nearest one is 4.3 light-years. It is called Alpha Centauri, and it is the location where the Proxima Centauri host star is orbited b… [+1895 chars]

articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.title: Five interesting facts you need to know about the Moon - The Indian Express
articles.description: From the Moon having an "atmosphere" to the fact that it is shrinking, here are five important facts that you need to know about the natural satellite that dominates our night sky.
articles.content: After two unsuccessful attempts at launching its Artemis 1 mission to the Moon, NASA engineers are now conducting maintenance works on the Space Launch System rocket while it is still at Launch Pad 3… [+4864 chars]

articles.title: SpaceX wins $1.4bn NASA contract for five astronaut launches - SatellitePro ME - SatelliteProME.com
articles.description: The contract modification includes ground, launch, in-orbit, and return and recovery operations, cargo transportation for each mission, and a lifeboat capability while docked to the ISS.
articles.content:
